title: Mjög öflug og lítið notuð Lenovo fartölva

posts.text:
Lenovo ThinkPad T470s-20HGS00V00 (ThinkPad T470s Series) með 4g möguleika 
ProcessorIntel Core i7-7600U (Intel Core i7)
Graphics adapterIntel HD Graphics 620, Core: 1150 MHz, 21.20.16.4550
Memory16384 MB  
, DDR4-2400 MHz, Dual-Channel, 8 GB soldered, 1 Slot (in use), up to 24 GB 
Þessi er með 16gb 
Display14 inch 16:9, 2560 x 1440 pixel 210 PPI, B140QAN01.5, IPS, glossy: no
MainboardIntel Kaby Lake-U Premium PCH
StorageSamsung SSD PM961 1TB M.2 PCIe 3.0 x4 NVMe (MZVLW1T0), 1024 GB  
, 916 GB free
Weight1.364 kg ( = 48.11 oz / 3.01 pounds), Power Supply: 356 g ( = 12.56 oz / 0.78 pounds)
Verð: 200þs. Skoða skipti á leikjavél .
Skoða líka tilboð og flestar pælingar
